column5: Well first off i want to thank my buddy and fellow OFC member ernie,  for taking me to the hospital in toronto for my back  surgery,and driving me home,well i also want to thanks everyone for all my well wishes,and all the kind words,from all the OFC members you guys are the best   and my julie for helping me & taking care of me!!!!.  ..And i sure hope to be fishing as soon as possible,i wanted to go tommorow,but julie said she would more or less kill me !!..lol..lol.   im pretty sore today ,but managing to get around a little bit,stairs are kinda hard but,i should be ok in a couple of weeks!!  .i will be very ready for the bay of quinte,real soon,and i will be looking forward to seeing everyone again at our fall g2g !! theres still lots of fishing time left and i usually keep my boat out till freeze up,and will be at it very soon,cheers everyone thanks alot... shawn
Be keerful Bubba!!! Ya don't wanna screw up what they just fixed!  Here's to a speedy recovery!!!

Good to hear all went well Shawn now follow doctors orders go fishing when you are sure you will not ferther damage your back.  Looking forward to seeing you in the BOQ bud now hurry up and book a cottage or bunk up with those who have not.
Hey Sean so did they put in one of those bionic implants good for reeling in 75 pound Muskies?
Heres to a speedy recovery Shawn!  Bill
Glad to hear it went well; and the good news is you have fish-porn to tide you over while you get better.
Great to hear the surgery went well!
happy to hear you are doing great!
Glad to hear you are on the mend, hope it goes quickly for you!
Since you can't get out fishing you may as well come help me finish my trim  I am sure Julie won't mind
Glad to hear you're back on the road to recovery, as mentioned above, don't rush the repair else risk another go at it.
Christ Shawn... take a fall off from fishing/working for cryin out loud.......... or you'll be back in for the hat trick operation ya silly bugger.
